data.actual_result: Nothing, it will just add a checkmark telling you have been muted/deafen, but you are still unmuted/undeafen
data.short_description: When you try to mute/deafen yourself in the new right click menu from the tray, it doesn't do anything.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel - Right click on Discord in the tray bar - Try to mute or deafen yourself
